This morning, I was blessed to witness a truly majestic sight — two bald eagles resting along the water’s edge.

The bald eagle, our national symbol, stands as a reminder of the strength, resilience, and freedom that define America. To see them so close, in their natural power and grace, was a moment of awe and deep reflection.

Nature has a way of humbling us — reminding us of God’s creation, the endurance of our nation, and the importance of protecting both.

Yet their presence is also a solemn call: as your Member of Congress, I will fight with every fiber of my being to safeguard our hard-fought gains and defend the freedoms and rule of law that make America strong.

America’s spirit still soars — and so will I, alongside you.

—TAC
